概要: 入れ子 | フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド 詳細: フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド

ow.routing
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm

既知の実装クラスの一覧:
AbstractChord, AbstractRoutingAlgorithm, Chord, ChordInAggressiveJoiningMode, Kademlia, Koorde, LinearWalker, Pastry, Plaxton, Tapestry
public interface RoutingAlgorithm

An interface through which a routing runtime works on a routing algorithm.

関連項目:
ow.routing.RoutingAlgorithmProvider#getAlgorithmInstance(RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration)

メソッドの概要
 IDAddressPair[] adjustRoot(ID target)
          Adjusts the root node.
 IDAddressPair[] closestTo(ID target, int maxNumber, RoutingContext context)
          Returns nodes (ID and address pairs) which are closest to the specified ID.
 java.math.BigInteger distance(ID to, ID from)
          Returns the distance between given two IDs.
 void fail(IDAddressPair failedNode)
          Notify the algorithm instance of a failure of a node.
 void forget(IDAddressPair node)
          The algorithm instance forgets the specified node.
 RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration getConfiguration()
          Returns the configuration object.
 java.lang.String getRoutingTableHTMLString()
          Returns a String representation of the routing table.
 java.lang.String getRoutingTableString(int verboseLevel)
          Returns a String representation of the routing table.

          Returns the initial routing context.
 void join(IDAddressPair[] neighbors)
          This method is called on the joining node.
 void join(IDAddressPair joiningNode, IDAddressPair lastHop, boolean isRootNode)
          Notifies the algorithm instance of a joining node.

          Reset the routing table.
 void resume()
          Resumes this instance after suspended.

          Returns a list of nodes (ID and address pairs) which are candidates for the root node for the specified ID.

          Stops this instance.

          Suspends this instance.

          Judges an existing entry to be replaced with the specified new entry in the routing table.
 void touch(IDAddressPair from)
          Notifies the algorithm that a node is alive.
 

メソッドの詳細

distance

java.math.BigInteger distance(ID to,
                              ID from)
Returns the distance between given two IDs.

パラメータ:
to - target.
from - starting point.

initialRoutingContext

RoutingContext initialRoutingContext(ID target)
Returns the initial routing context.

closestTo

IDAddressPair[] closestTo(ID target,
                          int maxNumber,
                          RoutingContext context)
Returns nodes (ID and address pairs) which are closest to the specified ID. The number of pairs is the given number or less than it. Results may include this node itself. Note that all returned nodes are not always alive.

rootCandidates

IDAddressPair[] rootCandidates(ID target,
                               int maxNumber)
Returns a list of nodes (ID and address pairs) which are candidates for the root node for the specified ID. In other words, the nodes are "neighbors" onto which this node replicates key-value pairs. Note that returned array should include the node itself.

adjustRoot

IDAddressPair[] adjustRoot(ID target)
Adjusts the root node. This method is invoked on the nearest node calculated by closestNodes(). In case of Chord, the root of a routing is the sucessor of the specified ID, but closestNodes() returns the closest precessor of the ID. This method returnds the closest sucessor of the ID based on the predecesor (tentativeLastHop).

戻り値:
candidates for the true last node in the order of priority. null if adjustment is not required.

join

void join(IDAddressPair[] neighbors)
This method is called on the joining node. Note that the first element of the given neighbors is the root node for the ID of this node.

パラメータ:
neighbors - nodes which should be closest from the joining node itself.

join

void join(IDAddressPair joiningNode,
          IDAddressPair lastHop,
          boolean isRootNode)
Notifies the algorithm instance of a joining node. This method is called on every node along the resolved route.

パラメータ:
joiningNode - an IDAddressPair of the joining node.
lastHop - the last hop of this node. possiblly null.
isRootNode - true if this node is the root node of the routing.

touch

void touch(IDAddressPair from)
Notifies the algorithm that a node is alive. For example, this method should be called when an packet was come from it.

forget

void forget(IDAddressPair node)
The algorithm instance forgets the specified node.

fail

void fail(IDAddressPair failedNode)
Notify the algorithm instance of a failure of a node. Note that each algorithm does not (cannot) implement this method because AbstractRoutingAlgorithm implements it.

getConfiguration

RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration getConfiguration()
Returns the configuration object.

toReplace

boolean toReplace(IDAddressPair existingEntry,
                  IDAddressPair newEntry)
Judges an existing entry to be replaced with the specified new entry in the routing table. This method is used internally in each algorithm and not required to be in this interface.

reset

void reset()
Reset the routing table.

stop

void stop()
Stops this instance. This method is called by RoutingService#stop() and an application usually does not have to call this method directly.

suspend

void suspend()
Suspends this instance.

resume

void resume()
Resumes this instance after suspended.

getRoutingTableString

java.lang.String getRoutingTableString(int verboseLevel)
Returns a String representation of the routing table.

getRoutingTableHTMLString

java.lang.String getRoutingTableHTMLString()
Returns a String representation of the routing table.
